name: SOURCE Fall 2012 Links
body:
## Online Resources
* [R-bloggers](http://www.r-bloggers.com/), An often-updated site that has tons of helpful R tips and hints from around the web.
* [Quick-R](http://www.statmethods.net/), Concise introduction to R basics, designed especially for people transitioning to R.


## Workshops, Courses, Etc.
* [Introductory Stats with R](http://www.umass.edu/issr/research/workshops/20121029_R.php) by the UMass Institute for Social Science Research
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
